title: COD Ghost Single Player [GOD FILES ONLY]
description:
No point downloading 16.3Gb when the Single player campaign is 9.6Gb.

Enclosed is the complete single player campaign DLC FROM DVD 2 HAS ALREADY BEEN INSERTED for you. 
You only need these files for Single player campaign.

THIS TORRENT IS FOR RGH/JTAG USERS ONLY, THESE FILES CANNOT BE BURNED.

Copy the 415608FC folder into your 0000000000000000 folder and force a re-scan/reboot in FSD and game will be detected.
